## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6ce6f08e5d97dc6ca2cdfebec58175d41bc0bea06e5a7529578116c8c7665788)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'react-native-wallet-sdk-demo-app' @ 100.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
